about.title: +8 years in active service
about.bio1: I'm José Gilarte, a digital marketing strategist and web developer with over 8 years of experience on the digital battlefield, helping businesses conquer new territories.
about.bio2: My approach combines data-driven intelligence with tactical execution and an obsession for measurable results. Every mission I take on has a clear objective: generate real impact.
about.bio3: From technical SEO reconnaissance to designing comprehensive marketing operations, I ensure every action has a strategic purpose and a verifiable return.

portfolio.title: Objectives achieved
portfolio.subtitle: Real results on the digital battlefield. Every mission tells a story of conquest.

ctaBanner.title: Is your target in <highlight>the crosshairs</highlight>?
ctaBanner.subtitle: Don't let your competition take positions. Every day without strategy is lost territory. We aim, execute, and conquer.

testimonials.title: What our allies say
testimonials.subtitle: Verified testimonials from successfully completed operations.

t1.quote: Since José took over our SEO strategy, organic traffic skyrocketed by 180%. His tactical, results-oriented approach positioned us in the top 3 for our main keywords.
t1.name: Ricardo Sánchez

t2.quote: Social media management and SEM campaigns completely transformed our business. Engagement multiplied and online bookings grew exponentially.
t2.name: Marco Pellegrini

t3.quote: Professional, strategic and with an impressive command of technical SEO. José took our consulting project to another level with measurable results from the first month.
t3.name: Ana Beltrán
